text: Vicente de Paula Mercedes, known as Vicente (born 2 March 1996) is a Brazilian football player. ==Club career== He made his Ukrainian Premier League debut for FC Lviv on 9 March 2019 in a game against FC Zorya Luhansk. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Grêmio Osasco Audax Esporte Clube players Category:FC Lviv players Category:KF Bylis Ballsh players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Kategoria Superiore players Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Albania
title: Vicente de Paula Mercedes
